hero.title: Smart Laboratory Inventory Management
hero.subtitle: Forget manual counting. Sensors, RFID, and QR codes monitor your supplies 24/7

problem.why-description: Tired of wasting time counting jars or dealing with Excel? LabIoT automates your inventory and alerts you before something goes wrong.

features.title: How it works in 3 steps
features.step1-description: Label your containers with RFID or QR codes for easy identification.
features.step2-description: Sensors monitor temperature, humidity and locations 24/7.
features.step3-description: The platform alerts you in real time and shows you what to do.

characteristics.title: Key Features
characteristics.feature1-description: RFID and QR for instant searches.
characteristics.feature2-description: Notifications via email or within the app.
characteristics.feature4-description: Connect with your ERP or purchasing system.
characteristics.feature5-description: Works from a small lab to a large one.
characteristics.feature6-description: Choose between basic inventory management or advanced monitoring.

benefits.benefit2: Prevents losses due to expiration or improper storage
benefits.benefit3: Compliant with regulations and facilitates audits

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Do I need to replace all the equipment?
faq.answer1: No, LabIoT is adaptable and can start with a pilot area.
faq.question2: Does it work with sensitive reagents?
faq.answer2: Yes, the sensors send alerts before any losses occur.
faq.question3: Does it integrate with my systems?
faq.answer3: Yes, we design integrations based on your purchasing or ERP systems.

footer.description: A smart laboratory platform that automates inventory control with IoT, RFID, and sensors. Our goal is to help you save time, reduce errors, and ensure the safety of your materials.
